title: Chicago Questions...
content:
Hello everyone,

I’m thinking about moving to Chicago shortly and I have a few questions for any familiar with the area.

1) What are some **great** firms located in the Chicago area? Links?

2) Where would you recommend living? I’m basically looking for a studio @ $1000~ a month...

If anyone can help me out, it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,  
Mike

 [‹ Font from printer's 1830 archive](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907210804/http:/typophile.com/node/45125 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type design DVD's/videos? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907210804/http:/typophile.com/node/18420 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rosem

comments.content:
When you say “firms,” it might help if you specified what kind of work you’re looking for. Are you looking for graphic design work? Print production work? Do you want to work in advertising? For a book publisher? A magazine?

Cheers,

T
Graphic design work, either web or print...

Hi Mike,

I’m in Chicago. If you shoot me an email, we could talk there.

Jackson
